Detailed Description

Class describing the reply to a TransactionDaysRequestPacket.

After the general ReplyPacket-header the format is: {tabular}{rll} Position & Size & Description \ 4 & 4 bytes & Number transaction days left\ 8 & 4 bytes & Time when current transaction day started\ {tabular}
